Enable Firefox TestPilot Activity Stream & Contribute

September 12, 2016

In previous post we have been discussing about Test Pilot project. In this post we will be discussing more about how to enable Activity Stream after installing Test Pilot Addon.

Now Steps to Enable Activity Stream.

  • Visit Activity Stream page
  • Click on Activity Stream Button

You can also visit experiment pages by clicking experiment name in the Test Pilot Add-on icon

Amazing Features

Activity Steam has some of the amazing features with it. The detailed information about these features will be shared in upcoming posts. Some of the features are listed below.

  • Visual Redesign of Bookmarks page
  • Your top Visited websites
  • Trending stories from Pocket in Highlights section
  • Playing videos from Youtube

Contribution

  • If you find any bug regarding Activity Stream, you can file in the Github repo under issue tab
  • If you want to discuss more and share your thoughts, visit discourse
  • If you are coder and would like to fix bugs, start cloing Activity Stream repo
Viswaprasth
